short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts UPD CRS schedule to ICalendar (.ics), CSV, and JSON formats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UP Diliman CRS Schedule Converter

Streamline your class scheduling with the UPD CRS Schedule Converter, a powerful browser extension designed to make your semestral enlistments easier. 

This extension effortlessly converts your UPD CRS schedules into formats that are compatible with popular calendar applications like Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, and more.

Key Features of the extension:

- Quickly transform your UPD CRS schedules into calendar-friendly formats (.ics, .json, .csv) with just a single click.

- Easily import your academic schedule to your preferred calendar app, ensuring you never miss a class.

- Simple usage process, designed for students who want to stay organized without all the hassle.

How to use: 

- Install and pin this extension on your browser for quick access.

- Log in to the UPD CRS Portal using your UP Mail and navigate to the Student Registration section found on the left hand side of the portal. 

- Once you're in the Student Registration Section, simply click the extension, select your desired format, and download the schedule to your device.

- After saving the schedule, access your preferred Calendar App (ex: Google Calendar) and import the downloaded file.
